attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please help us keep Underhill House open, 
Underhill Lane
Bushbury
Wolverhampton
West Midlands
WV10 8LP

Underhill House is registered with the Commission for Social Care Inspection
(CSCI) to provide accommodation and personal care for a maximum of thirtythree
adults. The service is managed by Wolverhampton City Council's Social
Services Department. Mr Brian O’Leary is the responsible individual and Mrs
Karen Atkins is the Registered Manager.
Underhill House is located off a main road on the north side of Wolverhampton
within close proximity to shops, a public house and the bus route into the City.
It is a two-storey building with lift access between floors. The home is divided
into five separate units, four offering long-term care and one unit dedicated to
short-term care. Each unit has it’s own sitting, dining area and kitchenette. All
bedrooms are single occupancy.
Don't take their home away!!
